item.title: BASH: Starting with best practices
item.description: Since I started using Linux and macOS I have spent an increasing amount of time using BASH for more than just it’s interactive shell. The thing I want to always remember is that it is is a rich tool that enables you to orchestrate a number of other programs in to working in tandem. For some this maybe be a given, but for me who wanted to learn to program first and foremost, I would often forget the principal about reinventing the wheel.
